content.full_text: The obesity codes in category E66, Overweight and obesity, include codes related to the cause of obesity, such as drug-induced obesity (E66.1), and codes related to effects of obesity, such as code E66.2, Morbid (severe) obesity with alveolar hypoventilation. There are other codes related to obesity in other categories of the classification, such as E88.82, Obesity due to disruption of MC4R pathway; and codes in fifth character subcategory O99.21, Obesity complicating pregnancy, childbirth, and the puerperium. (Evidence: pg no: 42, L16-L20)
content.summary: Describes the comprehensive coding system for obesity including causes, effects, and related conditions across multiple ICD-10-CM categories (Evidence: pg no: 42, L16-L20)
